articles.description: Netflix’s new series Lost Ollie continues the tradition of Toy Story, The Velveteen Rabbit, and other toy-focused stories. Starring Jonathan Groff, Tim Blake Nelson, Mary J. Blige, Gina Rodriguez, and Jake Johnson.
